org.perfidix.meter

Class MemMeter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.perfidix.meter.AbstractMeter
      • org.perfidix.meter.MemMeter

  • public final class MemMeter
extends AbstractMeter
    Meter to bench the amount of memory used by the current Benchmark. Please note that the results of this meter can only be seen as an approximation. Because Perfidix-processes are influencing the used memory as well, a small increasment of used memory is normal. However, because being based only on the Runtime-class of Java, no extraction of the perfidix processes themselves is possible. The MemMeter is only usable with an instance of the Memory enumeration for formatting purposes. This choose must be made by instantiation of the meter.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz
    See Also:
    Memory
